title: 一人多句你中意既電影對白

replies.msg: 不知道從什麼時候開始，在什麼東西上面都有個日期，秋刀魚會過期，肉罐頭會過期，連保鮮紙都會過期，我開始懷疑，在這個世界上，還有什麼東西是不會過期的？

I used to say I live my life a quarter mile at a time and I think that's why we were brothers - because you did too. No matter where you are, whether it's a quarter mile away or half way across the world, you'll always be with me. And you'll always be my brother.

Life's simple. You make choices and you don't look back.

Nostalgia is denial. Denial of the painful present. The name for this denial is Golden Age thinking - the erroneous notion that a different time period is better than the one ones living in - its a flaw in the romantic imagination of those people who find it difficult to cope with the present.

It's not who I am underneath but what I do that defines me

Ezekiel 25:17
The path of the righteous man is beset on all sides by the inequities of the selfish and the tyranny of evil men. Blessed is he, who in the name of charity and good will, shepherds the weak through the valley of darkness, for he is truly his brother's keeper and the finder of lost children. And I will strike down upon thee with great vengeance and furious anger those who would attempt to poison and destroy my brothers. And you will know my name is the Lord when I lay my vengeance upon thee.
你條女係雞黎呀
「不如我哋重頭來過。」
「不如我哋重頭來過。」

Choose a life. Choose a job. Choose a career. Choose a family. Choose a fucking big television. Choose washing machines, cars, compact disc players and electrical tin openers... Choose DSY and wondering who the fuck you are on a Sunday morning. Choose sitting on that couch watching mind-numbing, spirit crushing game shows, stucking junk food into your mouth. Choose rotting away in the end of it all, pishing your last in a miserable home, nothing more than an embarrassment to the selfish, fucked up brats you spawned to replace yourself, choose your future. Choose life... But why would I want to do a thing like that?

你條女係雞黎呀

三萬蚊 過夜呀
People can't do somethin' themselves, they wanna tell you that you can't do it.
俊？邊撚到俊？睇過

「係愛啊 哈利」

「去去武器走」
都係果句，容易襯衫丫嗎

都係果句，容易襯衫丫嗎

耶穌哭了 架車真係到左
I am Groot
屌你老母
人冇夢想 同鹹魚有咩分别

"I have to remind myself that some birds aren’t meant to be caged. Their feathers are just too bright. And when they fly away, the part of you that knows it was a sin to lock them up does rejoice. But still, the place you live in is that much more grey"
王家衛
World is nothing more than all the tiny things you left behind
如果世界上曾有那個人出現，其他人都會變成將就，而我不願意將就
Now this is my worst
